Welcome to Simple Vedas

Making Spirituality Simple for You

Simple Vedas is to serve as a bridge between the ancient and the modern, between the spiritual and the material, between the philosophy and the practice, so that one can easily understand, appreciate, and apply the Vedic technologies in one’s life, bringing to it more meaning and content, and thus enjoy the bliss that we all are really made for.

Welcome to Simple Vedas

Simple Vedas is to serve as a bridge between the ancient and the modern, between the spiritual and the material, between the philosophy and the practice, so that one can easily understand, appreciate, and apply the Vedic technologies in one’s life, bringing to it more meaning and content, and thus enjoy the bliss that we all are really made for.

Why Simple Vedas?

Systematic

Our courses are well-designed and extremely structured.

Practical

Knowledge is of true value only when theory is turned into practical.

Quiz

We not only teach you, but also make sure you learn.

4 Levels

Basic (Level 1) to Pro (Level 4) levels of learning the subjects.

Free Learning

Except a few, all our courses are either free or minimally charged.

Pace

You decide the pace at which you are comfortable to learn.

Scientific Spirituality

Scientific study is not limited to the realm of material or physical. It is also equally valid, if not more, in the metaphysical and spiritual arena. At Simple Vedas, we learn the vast and rich Science of Spirituality.

Hear it from Our Students

He Pan (何 畔)MBA, Retired HR Manager | Shenyang, China
The Gita course is highly authoritative, well-structured and story-filled, with very clear, concise, and easy to understand explanations. I really loved the vivid narrations and I especially found the PowerPoint presentations exquisitely attractive.
Kankana KarYoga Teacher and Therapist | Bangalore, India
I have taken up 2 live courses and 2 YouTube courses with Simple Vedas. All were very enlightening and illuminating. These courses are really substantial and life-altering. I haven’t been the same person I was before I took them. Madhusudana Visnu Das and his life lessons have been the go-to person / point for any complexities I have in life. He is very down to earth who is always there to help even with his busy schedule. I would strongly recommend everyone to go ahead and take up the courses and just watch your life transform.
Akshay GuptaStudent, Human Resource Management | Delhi, India
Simple Vedas is a platform where I have found a complete package of our Vedic wisdom. Personally, I have learnt so many philosophical concepts and also the tools to apply the teachings in my life. It is the teacher’s wonderful and pragmatic teaching that everyone can learn from these courses, beginners or pundits.
Daya Rupa Devi DasiEntrepreneur | Ghana, Africa
It is said that the more we learn, the more we realize we know nothing. Every time I attend a course, or hear a talk, or even simply read a quote, I get to learn so much. I have been much enlightened on the path of bhakti after associating with Simple Vedas. It is easy to understand, it is interesting, and it is practical. In other words, it is all in here. Thank you!
Vilas S. KoleswarChemical Engineer (Oil, Gas & Water Production) | Calgary, Canada
Doing the Bhakti-shastri course and other courses have been a life-changing experience for me. I have learnt much more than what I expected. The instructor is highly talented, dedicated and devoted. As a newcomer I had so many questions and concerns, but all were very patiently and appropriately answered and dealt with.
Nikita SatiStudent (BED, MSc. Chemistry, MA Hindi) | Dehradun, India
I have been a student of Gita for a long, but this course gave me an altogether different perspective of the ancient wisdom that the Gita contains. All the sessions were so mesmerizing. The knowledge presented herein is so practical and helpful, and definitely pushes one to think deeply and take one’s life more seriously, making it more meaningful.
Sailesh Kumar GuptaAircraft Maintenance Engineer | Abudhabi, UAE
The teaching and hand holding of the tutor has helped me improve the quality of my thought and action. I have attended the Gita Diploma Course, which turned out to be a stepping stone on the path of bhakti for me.
Sabrina SookdeoNursing | New York, US
I wanted my son Yogeshwar, who is 7 years old, to learn the 108 Gita verses. The guided memorization methods are so nice that it keeps the learner attentive and motivated to learn one after another. Adults too can easily learn the Gita verses with the help of these YouTube videos.
Ashok AnejaInternal Ombudsman, Punjab and Sind Bank | Delhi, India
These courses will make you fall in love with the Gita so much that you would want to read it again and again, muse upon the teachings, and be inspired to practically apply it in your life. I also very much like the Q/A sessions because the answers are always crisp, convincing and corroborated with relevant examples.
Geetha PobbathiCollege Lecturer | Chesterfield, UK
Simple, enchanting, and gripping. Each session is like that. I love to learn from you.
Salika DasaTemple President, ISKCON Jos | Nigeria, Africa
I first came across Madhusudana Visnu Das as an Online Bhakti-shastri student. What I appreciated about his teaching is that he does not only speak from a scholarly background but also from realizations. His ability to explain a very deep philosophical subject in a very simple and loving manner captures the heart of the listener. I have been studying the Gita for around 3 decades, but never had such an impactful experience as I had listening to his presentations.
Satya DevataExecutive Vice President, Lorhan IT Services | Hyderabad, India
Your understanding of the scriptures, the underlying philosophy and tattva is phenomenal! Your way of explaining & answering the questions is simply amazing! I was fortunate to attend your Gita and God’s Great Plan courses. Looking forward to attending many more and learning a lot from you.
Rasika Devi DasiHousemaker | Auckland, New Zealand
It is interesting, lively and intellectually stimulating! I enjoy these courses and find myself revisiting the sessions again and again.
Rohit NairVfx Artist | Mumbai, India
The courses are very systematic and easy to understand. Whether one is just starting his spiritual journey or is already somewhere in it, one will surely be benefitted and make further spiritual progress indeed.
Yi-Ying WeiTeacher | Taipei, Taiwan
I highly recommend the courses taught by Madhusudana Visnu Das. They are well-organized, profound, crystal-clear in presentation, and very effective. I very much like the Q/A part because his answers are sententious, full of wisdom, rigorous and sometimes with amazing humor.
Rasiksekar Das (Dr. Nay Aung)Dentist and Founder of Dental Education Centre | Yangon, Myanmar
I have been learning here for quite some time now and I really find it very inspirational. I have actually started valuing the scriptures and devotional life more and more. Eagerly waiting for more courses to come!
Vrindavanlila DD (Dr. Vrinda Baxi)PhD English, Author | Hyderabad, India
It is my good fortune to be Madhusudana Visnu Das’s student for Bhakti-sastri &amp; Bhakti- vaibhava courses. Though young, I must say that his classes are spiritually very scintillating, yet clear with examples steeped in real-life, exuding deep insights found on self-realization doled out with amazing patience! It is exhilarating to see such wisdom and most importantly his earnest endeavour to live what he professes in the class. I highly recommend him to everybody.
Dejan Đorđić (Dhananjay Das)PhD in Education | Serbia
I am currently enrolled in the Bhakti-sastri course, which is organized in a very systematic and consistent manner. Madhusudana Visnu Das presents the scriptures very concisely and clearly. During the course, we have the opportunity to learn in different ways and we are encouraged to think, connect and make arguments as we present. In short, it is pure nectar.
Govardhanadhari DasISKCON Monk, Preacher in Arab countries | Vrindavan, India
The study of the Bhagavad Gita and other important scriptures that Madhusudana Vishnu Prabhu is teaching online is ideal for today’s people, who are engaged in different daily activities; his teaching system is easy, practical, interactive and analytical.
